page.title: 04Employment in Meltham
page.content: In Meltham there are about 7000 people.The largest employer is{Case {Tractors}who for many years have had beteen 40% and 50% of its employees living in the{Meltham}area.Recently the sale of tractors has slumped owing to the world recession and hundreds of people have lost their jobs over the last two years.There are rumours that the firm may close altogether in 1987 which obviously will have a serious effect on the town.The next largest source of employment is that of the {service sector}in shops, doctors, garages etc.The main shopping area is in the centre of the village.Of those people who travel outside of Meltham over half of them travel to nearby Huddersfield.The remainder travel to the many large towns and cities around{Meltham,}such as Leeds,Bradford,Halifax and Batley.
